title: IGN's Greg Miller and Colin Moriarty Sing Filter
description: Video games can only pay the bills for so long. So, IGN's Greg Miller and Colin Moriarty are trying their hands at music. On today's docket, Filter's "Take A Picture."

transcript_chunks.text: Wake on my airplane, Wake on My Airplane, my skin is bad, my skin is bad. Not feeling like new and I feel like a newborn. Kicking and Screaming, "Hey Dad, what'cha Big B" what do you think about?
